name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Principle Software Engineer with expertise in End-to-End Development, I bring 8+ years of experience in software engineering, focusing on building robust solutions in e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors. I am proficient in **Go**, **TypeScript**, PostgreSQL, and **Redis**, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create high-performance applications. My strong foundation in algorithms and data structures, particularly in Graph Algorithms, enhances my ability to engineer efficient solutions. I have experience in developing secure and scalable applications, drawing from my background in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy) and modern frontend frameworks like **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**. Additionally, I am well-versed in utilizing cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure**, and optimizing databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB for superior system performance and reliability, all while adhering to best practices in microservices architecture and REST/gRPC API development.

experience.responsibilities:
• Led the architectural design and development of a scalable, cloud-native platform using **Go** and **TypeScript**, enhancing performance and reliability in delivering digital healthcare experiences.
• Developed and optimized algorithms for efficient data processing and real-time transactions within the system, ensuring robust end-to-end functionality.
• Created and maintained databases using **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, implementing effective data structures for improved query performance and system scalability.
• Guided the integration of **Go** microservices into existing workflows, ensuring seamless communication across automated healthcare and financial processes.
• Architected solutions employing **RESTful APIs** and **gRPC** in **TypeScript**, enabling secure and efficient data exchange between healthcare providers and services.
• Spearheaded the compliance of solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, embedding security best practices across all layers of development.
• Developed comprehensive test strategies using Python test frameworks alongside **TypeScript** to ensure high-quality and reliable software delivery.
• Mentored a team of 10+ engineers on best practices in **Go**, **TypeScript**, algorithms, and end-to-end development methodologies, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence.
• Conducted extensive performance analysis using monitoring tools to evaluate the efficiency of algorithms and system performance, leading to a 30% increase in response times.
• Implemented observability techniques across **Go** and **TypeScript** services, employing tools like Prometheus and Grafana to ensure proactive monitoring and rapid issue resolution.
• Championed the development of modular and scalable codebases, adhering to best practices in software architecture and design patterns for robust healthcare applications.
• Streamlined deployment processes for microservices via CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment times by 40% while enhancing operational efficiency and code quality.
• Pioneered data structures and graph algorithms to optimize data retrieval processes, significantly enhancing system performance under heavy loads.

- Led the development and migration of microservices-based backend architecture using **Go** and **TypeScript**, enhancing scalability, maintainability, and performance with a focus on **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** for efficient data storage.
- Designed and implemented secure RESTful APIs in **Go**, facilitating seamless communication between front-end applications and backend services with improved transaction management.
- Managed the integration of diverse databases, including **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, effectively optimizing data access and storage strategies to ensure high uptime and responsiveness.
- Spearheaded end-to-end development of user-centric applications utilizing **TypeScript** frameworks, ensuring enhanced user experience and engagement.
- Developed and maintained algorithms and data structures optimized for performance, directly contributing to application efficiency and faster processing times.
- Leveraged advanced graph algorithms for data analysis and visualization, enhancing the insights derived from application datasets.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, streamlining the development process to ensure efficient and timely delivery of software updates.
- Advocated for and applied rigorous software engineering practices, including code reviews and automated testing, guaranteeing a high-quality codebase and facilitating team knowledge sharing.
- Partnered closely with cross-functional teams to define technical requirements and align development efforts with business objectives, enhancing overall project delivery.
- Conducted performance analyses and optimizations within existing systems, leading to a **30%** increase in processing speeds and improved system reliability.
- Mentored junior engineers in **Go** and **TypeScript** best practices, contributing to team skill development and fostering a culture of continuous learning.
- Contributed to architectural design and strategy discussions, helping steer technical vision towards innovative solutions and modern technologies.

Utilized **Go** for building efficient backend services, enhancing performance and scalability in line with industry standards.
Developed and optimized system algorithms and data structures to improve application efficiency and effectiveness, resulting in a **30%** increase in processing speed for critical operations.
Leveraged **TypeScript** in full-stack development to create maintainable and scalable applications, ensuring enhanced code quality and team collaboration.
Designed, optimized, and managed relational databases using **PostgreSQL**, successfully reducing query latency by **40%** through effective indexing and optimization strategies.
Implemented caching strategies using **Redis** to improve application response times, achieving a **25%** reduction in server load during peak usage.
Conducted end-to-end development for key application modules, improving the overall user experience and satisfaction metrics by **15%**.
Performed rigorous testing with unit, integration, and end-to-end methods, bolstering code quality and reducing bug counts by **20%** prior to deployment.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices in algorithms and data structures, fostering a culture of excellence within the team.
Architected solutions leveraging **C++** and **Rust** for performance-critical components, ensuring efficient resource management and improved application performance.
Collaborated on cross-functional teams to align technology strategies with business objectives, ensuring robust and scalable platform solutions.

skills:
Programming Languages:
	Python, Go, TypeScript, C++, Rust

**Backend Frameworks:**
	FastAPI, Django, Flask, Spring Boot

**Frontend Frameworks:**
	Angular (1–16), React (15–18), Next.js, Vue.js (2/3), Blazor

**API Technologies:**
	REST & gRPC APIs

**Serverless and Cloud Functions:**
	AWS (Lambda), Azure (App Services)

**Databases:**
	PostgreSQL (Fintech), MySQL (Healthcare), MongoDB (Gaming), Redis

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS (ECS, RDS, S3), Azure (Blob, SQL)

**Other:**
	SQLAlchemy, Pydantic, Celery, Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), JWT, OAuth2, Let’s Encrypt, Nginx, Certbot, Algorithms, Data Structures, Graph Algorithms, End-to-End Development
